titles.title: SCREEN for Type 1 Diabetes Act of 2024
SCREEN for Type 1 Diabetes Act of 2024
Strengthening Collective Resources for Encouraging Education Needed for Type 1 Diabetes Act of 2024
A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to provide for a public awareness campaign with respect to screening for type 1 diabetes, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
